name: Gunslinger of the Desert
description:
Welcome Gunslinger,

this is a hard game of skill you need to get as many points as possible by hitting as many objects as possible without letting any bottle hit the ground in order to get a higher combo.

Your mouse is your revoler.So hold it like one. After every shoot you need to recock the hammer of the revolver by rolling your mousewheel backwards to you.

This game was made in 2 Weeks.
